TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReturnMessage extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage
type ReturnMessage = class interface IMethodReturnMessage interface IMethodMessage interface IMessage

summary.span: Przechowuje komunikat zwrócony w odpowiedzi na wywołanie metody dla obiektu zdalnego.

span.span: Holds a message returned in response to a method call on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Ta klasa sprawia, że zapotrzebowanie na łącza i dziedziczenia na poziomie klasy.This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. Element jest zgłaszany, gdy bezpośredniego obiektu wywołującego lub Klasa pochodna nie ma uprawnień infrastruktury.A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje na temat wymaganych zabezpieczeń, zobacz [zapotrzebowania na łącza](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) i [Inheritancedemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CS/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/VB/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.vb#1)]

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.
